summary:
Past Chairman of Nederlandse Vereniging voor Thoraxchirurgie (NVT, Dutch Society for Cardio-thoracic Surgery)
Co-Editor of Annals of Thoracic Surgery
Co-Editor of Asian Cardiovascular and Thoracic Annals
Member EACTS / STS / ISMICS

For interview with Dr. Berreklouw:
